Description: Laureate head of Severus II, right. (obverse)
Roma helmeted, seated left on throne with shield underneath; holding small Vicotry on globe, & leaning on sceptre. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RIC6 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. 6: from Diocletian's reform (AD 294) to the death of Maximinus (AD 313) (56, p.669)
Associated names: Named in inscription & portrayed: Severus II
